video.title: JS Books and Finishing Recipe Box - Code Vlog {23}

Repository:

You can find me on:

CC
-
We're busy people who learn to code, then practice by building projects for nonprofits. Learn Full-stack JavaScript, build a portfolio, and get great references with our open source community.

Join our community at https://freecodecamp.com
Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/freecodecamp
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/freecodecamp
Follow Quincy on Quora: https://www.quora.com/Quincy-Larson

topLevelComment.author: The Vandalist
topLevelComment.text: You have some seriously great videos. Thank you for spending so much time on them!

topLevelComment.author: Olga Tsytserova
topLevelComment.text: Such a pity the project is finished. Was a pleasure and inspiration to watch you doing FCC and keep going myself. Thanks for your vlog!

topLevelComment.author: Quail Man
topLevelComment.text: Where is the best place we can continue to follow you?

replies.author: the doer dev
replies.text: Whenever I start any new project similar to this, I will let you know on https://twitter.com/thedoerdoes
